blog-game-jam-meta-description: Portfolio entry: Developing an AI-driven game during a Game Jam in just 72 hours.
gamejam-section-intro-text: Participated in the Wowie Jam 4.0 under the theme 'Collaborate With AI'. The goal was to develop a game in only 72 hours, where collaboration with artificial intelligence is the core gameplay element. The project offered an exciting mix of creative and technical challenges.
gamejam-section-team-text: A dedicated team consisting of two programmers, a musician, and an artist worked hand in hand to develop a functioning, atmospheric game demo in just three days.
gamejam-section-theme-text: In 'Jack and Markus', a young boy gets lost in a mysterious forest. A dynamic forest creature helps him find his way to freedom. Depending on the player's choices, the creature evolves individually - melee or ranged fighter. This mechanic forms the central AI core of the game.
gamejam-section-tech-text: Developed using the Godot Engine. Main logic in GDScript, supported by C# components for AI. The state-based system dynamically adjusts the companion's behavior and development based on player interactions (distance, threats, direct actions).
gamejam-section-challenges-text: Main difficulty: team coordination under high time pressure. Level design had to be intuitive, while gameplay, UI, and atmosphere needed to function simultaneously - quick decisions and pragmatic solutions were essential.
gamejam-section-outro-text: The Game Jam was intense and educational. Our team delivered a working demo in three days - a valuable experience in agile development, team organization, and rapid decision-making. These learnings feed directly into future projects, especially regarding AI mechanics and efficient teamwork.
gamejam-highlight-1: 72-hour Game Jam: Game development under intense time pressure
gamejam-highlight-2: Dynamic AI mechanic: NPC evolves based on player decisions
gamejam-highlight-3: Godot Engine, GDScript & C# for gameplay and AI
gamejam-highlight-4: Efficient team coordination and agile development
gamejam-highlight-5: Focus on UX, level design, and cohesive game atmosphere
